column17:
Product Description

Herbal extracts Nuts and pulses are combined to reoxygenate and nourish the skin as they gently cleanse. It exfoliates the skin on your body leaving it feeling fresh smooth moisturised and soft. Skin polishing scrub improves the circulation of blood and lymph to the surface of the skin helping to fight cellulite and improve your skin tone without stripping the moisture content. Ingredients - Rubia Cardifolia Withania Somnifera Oscimum Gratissimum Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Prunus Amygdalus Juglans Regia Citrus Aurantium Cinnamomum Camphor Gram Flour & Oat Bran.
